name: Pie In The Sky (Thedrdevin)
description:
Take control of Barry the lonely pizza cat.  Explore space in his ship and search for ingredients to bake a pizza cat buddy.  

Made in 3 days for the Odd Weekend Game Jam #8

https://oddweekendgamejam.com/

Controls:

W and S to move forward and back

A and D to rotate your ship

press E to move on with dialogue
